Uses of Class
ai.rapids.cudf.Aggregation

  • Packages that use Aggregation 
    Package Description
    ai.rapids.cudf  

    • Uses of Aggregation in ai.rapids.cudf

      Subclasses of Aggregation in ai.rapids.cudf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Aggregate
      Deprecated. 
      please use Aggregation.onColumn instead.
      class  AggregationOnColumn
      An Aggregation instance that also holds a column number so the aggregation can be done on a specific column of data in a table.
      class  AggregationOverWindow
      An Aggregation instance that also holds a column number and window metadata so the aggregation can be done over a specific window.
      class  WindowAggregate
      Deprecated. 
      use Aggregation.onColumn.overWindow instead.
      Fields in ai.rapids.cudf declared as Aggregation 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Aggregation AggregationOnColumn.wrapped

      static Aggregation Aggregation.all()
      All reduction.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.any()
      Any reduction.

      Index of max element.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.argMin()
      Index of min element.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.collect()
      Collect the values into a list.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.count()
      Count number of valid, a.k.a.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.count(boolean includeNulls)
      Count number of elements.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.lag(int offset)
      In a rolling window return the value offset entries behind or null if it is outside of the window.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.lag(int offset, ColumnVector defaultOutput)
      In a rolling window return the value offset entries behind or the corresponding value from defaultOutput if it is outside of the window.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.lead(int offset)
      In a rolling window return the value offset entries ahead or null if it is outside of the window.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.lead(int offset, ColumnVector defaultOutput)
      In a rolling window return the value offset entries ahead or the corresponding value from defaultOutput if it is outside of the window.

      Max reduction.

      Arithmetic mean reduction.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.median()
      Median reduction.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.min()
      Min reduction.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.nth(int offset)
      Get the nth, non-null, element in a group.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.nth(int offset, boolean includeNulls)
      Get the nth element in a group.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.nunique()
      Number of unique, non-null, elements.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.nunique(boolean includeNulls)
      Number of unique elements.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.product()
      Product reduction.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.quantile(double... quantiles)
      Aggregate to compute the specified quantiles.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.quantile(QuantileMethod method, double... quantiles)
      Aggregate to compute various quantiles.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.rowNumber()
      Get the row number, only makes since for a window operations.
      static Aggregation Aggregation.standardDeviation()
      Standard deviation aggregation with 1 as the delta degrees of freedom.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Scalar ColumnView.reduce(Aggregation aggregation)
      Computes the reduction of the values in all rows of a column.

      This function aggregates values in a window around each element i of the input column.
